casebody.data:
Melvin SHERMAN
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 13, 2016

Peter G. Billings, in support of the petition.

James Rails, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Melvin Sherman's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 165 Conn.App. 903, 137 A.3d 119 (2016), is denied.
